Attackdex

Type: Fire

Voyager New Moves
Voyager Updated Moves
Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Armor Cannon 5 120 100 The user shoots out its armor, lowering its Def. and Sp. Def.
Bitter Blade 10 90 100 A bitter slash that restores the user's HP by half the damage taken by the target
Blast Burn 5 150 90 The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user can't move on the next turn.
Blaze Kick 10 85 90 The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily and may also burn the target.
Blazing Torque 10 80 100 A blazing spinning attack that may burn the target.
Blue Flare 5 130 85 The target is engulfed in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also burn it.
Burn Up 5 130 100 To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out, losing its Fire type.
Burning Bulwark 10 — — This move protects the user from attacks and burns any attacker that makes contact.
Burning Jealousy 5 70 100 All opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn are left with a burn.
Ember 25 40 100 The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.
Endothermia 15 75 90 The user absorbs thermal energy, restoring its HP by half of the damage caused.
Eruption 5 150 100 Explosive fury that scales with the user's HP attacks opposing Pokémon.
Fiery Dance 10 80 100 Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. This may also raise its Sp. Atk stat.
Fire Blast 5 110 85 The target is hit with a blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave it with a burn.
Fire Fang 15 65 95 The user bites with blazing fangs. It may also make the target flinch or burn it.
Fire Lash 15 80 100 The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.
Fire Pledge 10 80 100 When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.
Fire Punch 15 75 100 The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.
Fire Spin 15 35 85 The target becomes trapped within a vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.
Flame Burst 15 70 100 The user attacks a target with a bursting flame. Pokémon around the target are damaged too.
Flame Charge 20 50 100 Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target and raises its Speed stat.
Flame Wheel 25 60 100 The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave it with a burn.
Flamethrower 15 90 100 The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire and may be left with a burn.
Flare Blitz 15 120 100 The user cloaks itself in fire, then charges, damaging the user. It may burn a target.
Fusion Flare 5 100 100 This move's power is increased when influenced by an enormous lightning bolt.
Heat Crash 10 — 100 The user slams with its enflamed body. The move's power scales with the user's weight.
Heat Wave 10 100 90 The user exhales hot breath on opposing Pokémon. This may also leave them with a burn.
Incinerate 15 60 100 If opposing Pokémon are holding a Berry or Gem, it becomes burned up and unusable.
Inferno 5 100 50 The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves it with a burn.
Jettison 20 70 100 After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon.
Lava Plume 15 80 100 The user torches everything nearby in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also burn.
Magma Storm 5 100 75 The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for four to five turns.
Mind Blown 5 150 100 The user causes its own head to explode, damaging the user and everything around it.
Mystical Fire 10 75 100 The target is hit by a breath of special, hot fire. This also lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
Overheat 5 130 90 The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
Pyro Ball 5 120 90 The user launches a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave it with a burn.
Raging Fury 10 120 100 The user rampages by spewing flames for two-three turns before becoming confused.
Sacred Fire 5 100 95 The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity that may also leave a burn.
Searing Shot 5 100 100 The user torches everything around in an inferno of scarlet flames that may burn those hit.
Shell Trap 5 150 100 The user sets a shell trap. Physical moves blow it up, damaging opposing Pokémon.
Sizzly Slide 20 60 100 User cloaked in fire charges. Leaves the foe with a burn.
Sunny Day 5 — — The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.
Temper Flare 10 75 100 If the user's previous move failed, its temper doubles the power of this move.
Torch Song 10 80 100 The user spews flames as if singing, scorching the target. This boosts its Sp. Atk stat.
V-Create 5 230 100 The user attacks with a fiery forehead but has its defensive and Speed stats lowered.
Will-o-Wisp 15 — 85 The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.
